section.name: Cartridge Components
section.p: A Cartridge is made up of a jar/directory containg the following components:

tr.td: The descriptor which describes the components of the cartridge and allows the framework to 'discover' the cartridge.
Any templates used to process model elements which in turn generate source code.
Java *.class files for TemplateObject objects used within the templates (which must implement the TemplateObject interface).
